snippet: Xerox announced late in the evening that access had been restored for users in the 17 states affected by the failure, hours after the first problems were reported.
abstract: People in California, New Jersey and 15 other states find themselves temporarily unable to use their food stamp debit-style cards after routine test of backup systems by the vendor Xerox results in system failure; Xerox says access was restored hours after first problems were reported.
lead_paragraph: Xerox announced late in the evening that access had been restored for users in the 17 states affected by the failure, hours after the first problems were reported.

headline.main: Computer Failure Cuts Off Access to Food Benefits
headline.print_headline: Computer Failure Cuts Off Access to Food Benefits
